summary: Request to expose WHATWG TextEncoder and TextDecoder classes in the workflow sandbox to allow users to encode/decode text without delegating to activities or using polyfills.
userImpact: Users can now use TextEncoder/TextDecoder directly in workflows without requiring activities or external polyfills.
proposedFix: Expose TextEncoder and TextDecoder classes in the workflow sandbox global scope, similar to how Math.random stub is provided.
workaround: Delegate text encoding/decoding to local or regular activities, or load an appropriate polyfill.
resolutionDetails: Implemented and merged PR to expose TextEncoder and TextDecoder in the workflow sandbox.
keyQuote: This API includes no feature that could break workflow determinism (e.g. no file IO).
